page.title: 18RELIGION PAGE 1
page.content:
I go to a church called Briercliff Christian Fellowship. It is fairly small,with about 90 people.When it comes to the sermon all the children go to sunday school.At sunday school we learn songs and the person who is doing it talks to us about God.The children under the age of 8 go to another class and they make things.I've been going to church for 9 years and I've been a Christian for 6 years.You have a better and longer life being a Christian.
I go to Holy Trinty Church on the first week of the new month.Just before the service starts the cubs,brownies and guides take up 4 flags.At the end of the service everybody stands up and they take the flags down the isle then everybody walks over to the refreshments.
